title: HoP 344 - The Count of Concord - Pico della Mirandola
itunes:title: HoP 344 - The Count of Concord - Pico della Mirandola
description: Pico della Mirandola argues for the harmony of the ancient authorities, draws on Jewish mysticism, and questions the value of humanist rhetoric.
content:encoded: Pico della Mirandola argues for the harmony of the ancient authorities, draws on Jewish mysticism, and questions the value of humanist rhetoric.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson
